data.actual_result: The sheet appears only on dark theme and not on light theme.
data.expected_result: The sheet appears on both themes.
data.short_description: There's a gray film around the status selection on long press on dark theme but no such thing on light theme.
data.steps_to_repro: - Switch to dark theme. - Open the status selection sheet. - Long press on any status. - Observe a film around it. - Now, switch to light theme. - Open the status selection sheet and long press any status.
